page.title: 07Werrington Health Clinic
page.content: The Werringto Health Clinic is situated in Salters Lane.The mothers attend the clinic every 3 weeks.Most of them think that the clinic is a good idea.Mothers can ask advise instead of going to the doctor.The health visitor visits many homes and examines the children in case they are being mistreated when the mothers come out of hospital.The babies are weighed and if their mothers think that they are ill the doctor examines them. There is also an ante-natal clinic where many books and leaflets are available.Powdered milk is sold and also vitamin drops.The doctor keeps a record of everything about the baby's breathing and its weight. About 30 - 70 people attend the clinic in one week. The clinic covers the whole area of Werrington,Blythe Bridge and Cheadle.
